sentences.en: I saw his brindled cow feeding on fish remnants.
sentences.cn: 我看见他的用鱼杂碎喂养的斑纹奶牛。

sentences.en: I saw his brindled cow feeding on fish remnantsHerman Melville.
sentences.cn: 我看见他的用鱼杂碎喂养的斑纹奶牛。

sentences.en: Nothing was stirring except a brindled, grey cat, which crept from the ashes, and saluted me with a querulous mew.
sentences.cn: 除了一只有花纹的灰猫从灰堆上爬起来，冲我不满的喵了一声外，真是万象具静啊。

words.tran_cn: 有斑纹的；有虎斑的（等于brindled）

trans.tran_en: a brindled animal is brown and has marks or bands of another colour
